March 8, 1924 D City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section)
City of Leicester Brass Band Festival (Championship Section) 10 Test Piece Contest City of Leicester Brass Band Festival city-leicester-brass-band-festival-champ-934
William Tell [unknown arranger]
De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £15 and shield, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £7 and cup, 4th £5, 5th £3. 1st annual contest. 12 bands competed.
